data.name: AaaUtfDummy
data.comment: A text containing non-Ansi characters to make Phraseapp download behave. Does not need translation, but should be there.

data.name: AccountLoggedOnStatusText
data.comment: Title bar status text when logged on to an account.

data.name: AccountMustBeVerified
data.value: The account must be verified by the user first.
data.comment: Error message when an attempt is made to use an unverified account.

data.name: ActivateErrorEmailOrCode
data.value: The provided e-mail or verification code is incorrect.

data.name: ActivateErrorNoRequest
data.value: Password reset failed. A password reset request has not been made for this AxCrypt ID.

data.name: ActivateMailBodyFreeTrial
data.value: You can start your trial of AxCrypt Premium features for 30 days in the app!

data.name: ActivateMailBodyFreeTrialPlainText
data.value: You can start trying AxCrypt Premium features for 30 days in the app!

data.name: ActivateMailBodyIntro
data.value: You have signed up to use AxCrypt. To complete the process you must verify your email address. Doing so proves you own the email and gives us permission to send email to you.

data.name: ActivateMailBodyManualLink
data.value: To verify manually, go to {0} and enter {1} and the verification code {2} .

data.name: ActivateMailBodyManualLinkPlainText
data.value: To verify manually, go to {0} and enter {1} and the verification code {2} .

data.name: ActivateManuallyPageBody
data.value: Stop! You should only be here because clicking on the link in the AxCrypt ID verification e-mail from AxCrypt did not work. (You must of course register for an AxCrypt ID to get an verification e-mail) Enter your e-mail and code manually here only if you have received the verification e-mail, but the link did not work.

data.name: ActivatePageBody
data.value: To create your AxCrypt ID {0} you must select a password. Choose something difficult to guess, since it will protect passwords in the online password manager as well as access to the site. Type slowly and carefully, and do not forget your password!

data.name: ActivateSuccess
data.value: Your AxCrypt ID has been verified! Please sign in.

data.name: ActivationCodeSentMessage
data.value: We sent you an email at {0}
data.comment: Message about mail with activation code.

data.name: ActivationCodeTitle
data.comment: Title of ActivationCode step on SignUp page in mobile application

data.name: ActiveFileToolTip
data.value: Double-click opens a Password-dialog before opening the secured file.

data.name: AddFileLabel
data.comment: Tooltip for "AddFile" button in mobile application

data.name: AdditionalUnsubscribedConfirmation
data.value: We may still send you email if it's vital to the function or security of AxCrypt.
data.comment: Additional information about the scope and meaning of the unsubscribe.

data.name: AddSecureFolderTitle
data.value: Select a folder to keep secured with AxCrypt. Existing files will be encrypted now.
data.comment: Displayed as prompt, title or description when adding a new secure folder via a folder browser.

data.name: AlreadyRegisteredLink
data.comment: Link to sign in page.

data.name: AlreadyVerifiedInfo
data.value:
Oops. You already verified your account, that's great!
Please sign in using the same password you used then.
data.comment: A brief informative message the account is already verified, and to please use the password already set to sign in.

data.name: AlwaysOffline
data.comment: Menu choice with checkbox indicating if we are running offline or not.

data.name: AlwaysOfflineToolTip
data.value: When enabled, Internet access is never used or required, until disabled.
data.comment: A tool tip explaining that this causes AxCrypt never to access the Internet.

data.name: AnonymousRenameToolTip
data.value: Hide the real name of a secured file by renaming it to something random.

data.name: ApplicationTitle
data.comment: Title of mobile application

data.name: AppSignInMessage
data.value: For security reasons, please enter your password again.
data.comment: The message we show when we need to be signed in to the web, but we're coming from an app-link.

data.name: AppVersionLabel
data.comment: Text containing information about current application version.

data.name: AuthenticationError
data.value: The page you tried to visit requires authentication. Please sign in to proceed.

data.name: AutoDeletionEmailOutro
data.value: You do not need to respond or do anything. If you do nothing, no more e-mails will be sent and your AxCrypt ID account will be deleted permanently.
data.comment: The final text in the auto deletion e-mail, stating that if you do nothing no more e-mail will be sent and the account will be deleted.

data.name: AutoDeletionMailBodyIntro
data.value: You gave us your e-mail as part of installing or using AxCrypt, through an app or the web. We sent you an verification code via e-mail, but you've not used it. If you do not immediately verify your AxCrypt ID account by using the verification code we'll be removing you permanently from our system.

data.name: AutoDeletionMailBodyTitle
data.value: We're about to delete your AxCrypt ID!
data.comment: The title of the deletion e-mail

data.name: AutoDeletionMailSubject
data.value: Your AxCrypt ID account will soon be deleted!

data.name: AxCryptAboutDescription
data.value:
File Security For You and Your Team by AxCrypt AB
Includes software from http://www.bouncycastle.org/ .

data.name: AxCryptBetaWarning
data.value:
Warning! This is untested beta software. This means that it may be missing features and be unstable. Texts may be missing and user interface might be incomplete.
Use with care and ensure you have up-to-date backups of all your data. Please report any issues to https://bitbucket.org/axcryptab/axcrypt-xwt/issues or support@axcrypt.net .
You have been warned, now enjoy!
data.comment: A text that is shown to users starting a beta version of our software.

data.name: BadEmail
data.comment: Displayed when email address format validation fails.

data.name: BeneficiaryEmailLabel
data.value: Email address of account to buy Premium for
data.comment: The prompt text for the input text field where a beneficiary email address is entered

data.name: BeneficiaryInvitationTitle
data.comment: The main title when a user must be invited to be able to pay for

data.name: BeneficiaryNoAccount
data.value: {0} doesn't have an account with us, send an invite to register an account and continue.

data.name: ButtonCloseText
data.comment: Text of "Close" button.

data.name: ButtonDisableText
data.comment: A single word text for a button or similar to disable an option or turn something off. The word 'off' is an alternative, also for translation if 'disable' is hard to translate.

data.name: ButtonEnableText
data.comment: A single word for a button or similar that enables an option. The word 'on' is an alternative if the translation of enable does not make sense.

data.name: ButtonNewToolTip
data.value: Click to change the AxCrypt ID e-mail to use for sign in.
data.comment: The new AxCrypt ID button tooltip

data.name: ButtonPasswordResetText
data.comment: Button text for a password reset button

data.name: ButtonPasswordResetToolTip
data.comment: Tooltip text for a button to click for resetting password.

data.name: ButtonStartTrial
data.comment: Text displayed on "Start trial" button prompt.

data.name: CaptchaLabel
data.value: Prove that you're a real person and not automated software!

data.name: ChangeEmailConfirmMailBody1
data.value: You have requested to change your current AxCrypt ID e-mail to {0}. To confirm please click the button below.

data.name: ChangeEmailConfirmMailBody2
data.value: Use your existing password to sign in and then the old AxCrypt ID will be permanently deleted.

data.name: ChangeEmailConfirmSuccess
data.value: Your change of AxCrypt ID e-mail has been confirmed! Please sign in to complete the process.

data.name: ChangeEmailExistMailBody1
data.value: Someone has requested a change of e-mail (from an undisclosed source) at AxCrypt.net to {1}.

data.name: ChangeEmailExistMailBody2
data.value: However, since you already have an AxCrypt ID using this e-mail, the request has been silently ignored.

data.name: ChangeEmailExistMailBody3
data.value: Ignore this e-mail or report it to {0}. No harm is done, and no information has been disclosed.

data.name: ChangeEmailMarkError
data.value: Email change failed due to an internal error, please try again later or contact our support.

data.name: ChangeEmailMarkErrorCurrentEmail
data.value: The new e-mail address must be different from the old!

data.name: ChangeEmailMarkSuccess
data.value: We have sent an e-mail to {0}. Please read your e-mail and click on the link provided there to confirm the change. Thereafter you can sign in using {0} and your existing password. You must complete these steps to complete the process.

data.name: ChangeNotificationSettingsSuccess
data.value: Your notification preferences have been changed.

data.name: ChangeOptionGenericWarning
data.value: Changing options may be dangerous. Only do this if you are sure you understand what this option does.

data.name: ChangePasswordError
data.value: Could not change password because the current password is incorrect or the new password is invalid.

data.name: ChangePasswordErrorUserNotFound
data.value: Internal error: Could not change password because the current user was not found.

data.name: CheckForUpdateMenuToolTip
data.value: Check if a newer version is available for download. Requires Internet access.

data.name: CleanUpNeededToolTip
data.value: File is open, and may need to be cleaned. Close any open applications, and click the Clean Up button.

data.name: CleanupWorkflowDescription
data.value: Please consider that app keeps decrypted copy of file in the local file storage. It will be removed on sign out. You can also remove it manually via cleanup button.
data.comment: Warning message displayed in mobile application before first decryption.

data.name: ClickToCheckForNewerVersionTooltip
data.value: Click to check for a newer version.

data.name: CloseAndRemoveOpenFilesToolStripButtonToolTipText
data.value: Click to encrypt any opened files or new files in secured folders, but ensure they are not in use first.

data.name: ColumnFolderHeader
data.comment: Columnheader containing a folder name.

data.name: ConfigurationSuccess
data.value: The application configuration property was updated successfully. You might have to restart the server to make the changes take effect.

data.name: ConfirmAllCheckBoxText
data.value: Do this for all remaining files?

data.name: ContinueLabel
data.comment: Text of "Continue" button on SignUp page in mobile application

data.name: CookiePolicyBlockedError
data.value: The action was blocked because cookies are disabled in your browser.

data.name: CookiePolicyPageBody
data.value:
We do not store permanent cookies on your hard disk, we set a few session cookies that are removed when the web browser is closed. They are necessary to keep your sign in session valid and secure. We do not track your use of the site, nor are they available to any third party.
The cookies are further secured by requiring that all sensitive communication with the server is encrypted with HTTPS, by encrypting the cookie itself and by making the cookie unavailable to script in your browser.
If you do not accept our temporary session cookies you cannot sign in and the site may not perform as expected.

data.name: CookiesDisabledError
data.value: Cookies appear to be disabled in your browser. Unless you accept session cookies from us you cannot sign in and the site may not perform as expected. Read more in our cookie policy.

data.name: CreateAccountToolStripMenuItemToolTipText
data.value: Create an AxCrypt ID with a sharing and access keys, to use and share files securely.

data.name: DaysLeftWarningToolTip
data.value: Your Premium subscription is about to expire. Click to renew.

data.name: DecryptAndRemoveFromListToolStripMenuItemText
data.value: Stop securing and remove from list

data.name: DecryptedFilesWarning
data.value: These files could not be re-encrypted:
data.comment: A line of text stating that here follows a list of files that are left in their decrypted state. It should be fairly short.

data.name: DecryptedFileToolTip
data.value: Assumed open. Try to Close the application, or use the Clean function to remove it.

data.name: DecryptedSaveAsFileDialogTitle
data.value: File exists, choose a new name to save as

data.name: DecryptedUnknownKeyFileToolTip
data.value: The password has not been entered yet. Double-click to enter password and Open, or right-click for options.

data.name: DefaultEncryptionKeyIsIsetToolTip
data.value: You are Signed In. Click to Sign Out.

data.name: DefaultSecureFolderToolTip

data.name: DeleteAccountSuccess
data.value:
Your AxCrypt ID has been successfully deleted.
We're sad to see you go and hope you enjoyed your time with AxCrypt!

data.name: DeleteSecretErrorNotFound
data.value: The deletion failed because the requested password could not be found.

data.name: DialogAxCryptIdFirstTimeText
data.value: The first time you start AxCrypt a real email address is required. Click help for more information.

data.name: DialogExportSharingKeyFilter
data.value: AxCrypt Public Sharing Key Files (*.txt)|*.txt|All Files (*.*)|*.*

data.name: DoubleClickToOpenToolTip
data.value: Double click to open. If required you will be prompted for a password.

data.value: You are limited to read-only access! Only Premium users are allowed to edit or create new password entries.

data.name: EditSecretErrorNotFound
data.value: The requested password entry could not be found.

data.name: EmailAppLink
data.comment: Text of link for opening mail application.

data.name: EmailLanguageInformation
data.value: We try to send mailings in your language, but if you send us email we may respond in English. Please use Google Translate or similar if required.
data.comment: Explain to the user that while we're trying to send automatic e-mail to them in their own language, we may actually respond in English, and suggest the use of Google Translate. The translation should probably read: "We try to send mailings in [Language], but if you...2

data.name: EncryptToolStripButtonToolTipText
data.value: Click to select files to secure.

data.name: EnumerateUsersSuccess
data.value: User enumeration was successful. You might have to refresh the page to get the updated statistics.

data.name: ErrorEmailMismatch
data.value: The verification does not match the email

data.name: ErrorPasswordMismatch
data.value: The password verification does not match the password.

data.value: The password must be at least {2} characters.

data.name: Exception
data.comment: @Invariant

data.name: ExpireInLabelFirstPart
data.comment: The first part of "Expired in x days" label in mobile application

data.name: ExportMyPrivateKeyToolStripMenuItemText
data.value: Export AxCrypt ID Secret and Sharing Key Pair

data.name: ExportMyPrivateKeyToolStripMenuItemToolTipText
data.value: To move an AxCrypt ID, export the Secret and Sharing Key Pair and then import it elsewhere.

data.name: ExportSharingKeyToolStripMenuItemToolTipText
data.value: Send the exported Public Sharing Key to others you want to be able to share encrypted files with you.

data.name: FailedPrivateImport
data.value: Import failed. Probably not a valid AxCrypt ID file.

data.name: FeedbackButtonText
data.value: How are we doing? Please give us feedback!

data.name: FeedbackCategoryPraise
data.comment: Displayed name of "Praise" feedback category in mobile application

data.name: FeedbackCategoryProblem
data.comment: Displayed name of "Problem" feedback category in mobile application

data.name: FeedbackCategoryQuestion
data.comment: Displayed name of "Question" feedback category in mobile application

data.name: FeedbackDescriptionLabel
data.value: Please tell us what you think, and kind of feedback is highly appreciated.
data.comment: Text which motivates user to send feedback

data.name: FeedbackFromUserMailSubject
data.comment: The mail subject used when an email is sent to us as a result of user feedback via an app

data.name: FeedbackTextPrompt
data.comment: Text displayed in feedback content textbox when it is empty

data.name: FileAssociationBrokenWarning
data.value: Double-click to open AxCrypt files outside of AxCrypt may not function correctly. The operating system file association for extension ".axx" appears to be broken. Contact your IT support or search for a solution on the Internet.
data.comment: A text that is shown to users starting the association with .axx file is broken. It should not mention "Windows", or "Mac" etc so it can be used in all environments.

data.name: FileIsLockedWarning
data.value: '{0}' is open in another application. Please close it and try again.

data.name: FollowUsTitle
data.comment: Title of panel with social links in mobile application

data.name: FooterInfoBody
data.value: This is the AxCrypt ID section of AxCrypt.net, click here to go back to the start page.

data.name: GetLogErrorDateFormat
data.value: The start and/or end date format is invalid. Please use the format YYYY-MM-DD.

data.name: GetLogErrorLogType
data.value: The selected log type is invalid.

data.name: HaveAccountInfo
data.value:
Great! You already have an AxCrypt ID account for '{0}'.
If you for any reason do not know or remember the password, you must perform a password reset.
data.comment: A text displayed during initial startup explaining that the user already has an account with that email, and if the password is unknown a password reset must be issued in order to sign in. If {0} is present, the email address will be displayed there.

data.name: IdleMinutesSignOutToolStripMenuItemText
data.comment: A menu text where the user selects after how many minutes of inactivity AxCrypt should automatically sign out. The '{0}' part is replaced by for example '5', '15' etc by the code before the text is shown to a user.

data.name: IdleSignOutToolStripMenuItemText
data.comment: A menu text for the automatic sign out after X minutes of inactivity. It must be short to fit in a menu comfortably.

data.name: ImportMyPrivateKeyToolStripMenuItemText
data.value: Import AxCrypt ID with sharing and access keys.

data.name: ImportMyPrivateKeyToolStripMenuItemToolTipText
data.value: To move an AxCrypt ID, export the Secret and Sharing Key Pair and then import it here.

data.name: ImportOthersSharingKeyToolStripMenuItemToolTipText
data.value: Ask your contact to export and send his/her Public Sharing Key to you and import it here. Then you can share encrypted files.

data.name: IncludeSubfoldersConfirmationBody
data.value: You are about to enable a dangerous option. If you are not careful, you may affect more data than you intend causing operations to take very long time, or breaking other softwares including the operating system. Are you sure?

data.name: IncludeSubfoldersDescription
data.value:
When the Include Subfolders option is enabled, watched folders and other operations encrypting and decrypting files with folders will include subfolders and all subfolders below.
This may cause some operations to take very long time. Please be careful not to select a folder with folders below that should not be encrypted.
data.comment: A short text in a few sentences describing what the Include Subfolders option does.

data.name: InformationTitle
data.comment: A dialog box title for general announcement and informative message dialog boxes

data.name: InternetNotRequiredInformation
data.value:
Internet is NOT REQUIRED to use AxCrypt.
Internet access is recommended, and required to enable Premium. Some features work better and critical updates may not reach you otherwise.
Your password is not stored on our servers, and the connection is always encrypted.

data.name: InvalidEmail
data.value: Incorrect format for an email address.

data.name: InvalidPath
data.value: The file or path '{0}' is invalid for this.

data.name: InvitationMailBodyIntro
data.value: You have been invited to AxCrypt File Security by {0}. To start securing your files just download and install AxCrypt. Sign in to AxCrypt with {2}, enter the verification code and set your secret password.

data.name: InvitationMailBodyIntroPlainText
data.value:
You have been invited to AxCrypt File Security by {0}.
To start securing your files just download and install AxCrypt from {1}.
Sign in to AxCrypt with {2}, enter the 6-digit verification code and set your secret password.

data.name: InvitationMailSubject
data.value: Invitation to use AxCrypt File Security

data.name: InvoiceCustomer
data.comment: This is a label on a receipt or invoice, prefixing the user that has actually made a payment, i.e. if bob@axcrypt.net has made a payment, it says: Payed by: bob@axcrypt.net .

data.name: InvoiceIssuedByAxcrypt
data.comment: This is a label on an invoice or recieipt stating that it a payment was made to us, i.e.: Paid to: AxCrypt AB

data.name: InvoiceOrderNr
data.comment: The payment provider reference id of the transaction

data.name: InvoiceOurAddress
data.value: AxCrypt AB Birger Jarlsgatan 58 SE-114 29 Stockholm SWEDEN VAT Number SE 556967618101

data.name: InvoicePaidForLabel
data.comment: This is a label on a receipt or invoice, prefixing the user that is the benficiary of a payment made by someone else. if alice@axcrypt.net pays for bob@axcrypt.net, then it says: Paid for: bob@axcrypt.net .

data.name: ItalianLanguageSelection
data.comment: The name of the language Italian in Italian. It should never be translated.

data.name: JavaScriptDisabledError
data.value: JavaScript appears to be disabled in your browser. Unless you enable JavaScript you cannot sign in and the site may not perform as expected.

data.name: KeySharingExistsToolTip
data.value: The file key is shared with other AxCrypt users.

data.name: KeySharingOffline
data.value: New contacts can only be added when online!

data.name: KeySharingToolTip
data.value: Click to select encrypted files to share keys with others.

data.name: KnownFolderNameDropbox
data.comment: The non-translatable name for the dropbox could service

data.name: KnownFolderNameGoogleDrive
data.comment: The non-translatable name of the the Google Drive cloud service provider

data.name: KnownFolderNameICloud
data.comment: The non-translatable name for the Apple iCloud service provider

data.name: KnownFolderNameMacDocuments
data.comment: The localized name of the "Documents" folder in Mac OS X. This MUST be translated to the official localization used by Apple for the "Documents" folder.

data.name: KnownFolderNameOneDrive
data.comment: The non-translatable name for the Microsoft OneDrive cloud service provider

data.name: KnownFolderNameWindowsMyDocuments
data.comment: The translatable name for the Windows "My Documents" folder. This MUST be translated to the name used by Microsoft in a localized version of Windows!

data.name: KoreanLanguageSelection
data.comment: The text to display when selecting Korean as the UI language. It should always be in Korean.

data.name: LanguageChangeRestartPrompt
data.value: AxCrypt must be restarted in order for the language change to take effect.

data.name: LauncherPromptHeader
data.comment: Header of popup which is displayed for file opening.

data.name: LavasoftWebCompanionExistenceWarning
data.value: We have detected potentially incompatible software that may cause AxCrypt and other software to malfunction. This software is named Lavasoft Web Companion. If AxCrypt malfunctions, try to uninstall Lavasoft.

data.name: LegacyConversionVerificationPrompt
data.value:
After files are converted from AxCrypt 1.x format, you must use the new Sign In password to open them, so please verify it here.
Do not forget this password!

data.name: LegacyOpenMessage
data.value:
AxCrypt 2 uses a new file format.
You can open legacy AxCrypt 1.x files but unless they are converted you have to provide the original password even when signed in.
Enable automatic conversion of AxCrypt 1.x files (recommended)?

data.name: LicenseViewerNameText
data.comment: The name of the viewer plan, where no encryption or re-encryption is allowed.

data.name: LinkTextBackToMainSite
data.comment: Menus and similar to link back to main site.

data.name: LoggedOnStatusText
data.comment: Shown in the title bar to display the log on status.

data.name: LoginError

data.name: LoginPurchaseError

data.name: LowEncryptionWorkingToolTip
data.value: Upgrade to Premium to enable the strongest protection.

data.name: MailBodyFooter
data.value: If it is unclear why you are receiving this from AxCrypt.net, you can ignore this email or report it to {1}.

data.name: MailBodyFooterPlainText
data.value: If it is unclear why you are receiving this from AxCrypt.net, you can ignore this email or report it to {0}.

data.name: MailBodyOutroHtml
data.value: Feel free to contact me if you have any questions or feedback. Also see our FAQ and Forum on our website at {0} .
data.comment: This is the common last paragraph above the signature in emails. {0} is the content web site root.

data.name: MailBodyPremiumFeaturesHtml
data.value:
• 256-bit AES
  • Key Sharing
  • Secured Folders
  • Password Management
  • Cloud Storage Awareness

data.name: MailBodySignature
data.value:
Thanks for using AxCrypt!
- Svante
The AxCrypt team

data.name: MailBodySignaturePlainText
data.value: Thanks for using AxCrypt! - Svante The AxCrypt Team

data.comment: Internal use only. Do not translate.

data.name: McHlpMenuRename

data.name: McHlpMenuWipe

data.name: McHlpMenuWrapZ
data.value: First compress, then encrypt the document.

data.name: McHlpMenuWrapZC
data.value: First compress, then encrypt the document. Keep the original.
data.comment: Tooltip for the context menu for encryption

data.name: McInfAbout
data.value: Compressing and Encrypting Wrapper and Application Launcher for Secure Local, Server or Web Storage of Document Files. This program is licensed according to the agreement. %n%n%2 %n%nAcknowledgements: %nThe Legion of the Bouncy Castle Inc.
data.comment: Abut text in property sheet. Be careful with the %-coded things.

data.name: McInfAuth
data.comment: Name of authentication code, HMAC. Should probably not be translated.

data.comment: Lead-in header for Message Authentication Code, i.e. integrity validation

data.comment: Lead-in header for compression algorithm in property sheet

data.name: McInfEnc
data.comment: Name of the encryption algorithm in the property sheet. Should probably not be translated.

data.comment: Context menu for encrypt

data.comment: Context menu for encrypting a copy

data.name: McInfRand
data.comment: This is the name of the PRNG. It should probably not be translated.

data.name: McInfRandLead
data.comment: This is the lead-in for the name of the Pseudo Random Number Generator used. It should probably not be translated.

data.name: McMsgInternalError
data.comment: Internal use only. Do not translate.

data.name: McMsgMemoryAlloc
data.comment: Internal use only. Do not translate.

data.name: McMsgSystemCall
data.comment: General error message. Careful about the %-stuff

data.name: MenuLabel
data.comment: Tooltip for "Menu" button in mobile application

data.name: MessageAskAboutStartTrial
data.value:
We noticed you don't have a Premium subscription, so we'd like to start a free Trial for you!
Without Premium you can only view and permanently decrypt encrypted files.
data.comment: Message which is displaying after registering new account in mobile application. It asks user to start trial premium subscription.

data.name: MessageErrorTitle
data.comment: Title of error message box for generic error

data.name: MessageExitConfirmation
data.value: Do you really want to exit?
data.comment: Message which is displayed in mobile application, when user tries to exit from app via back button

data.name: MessageInvalidSignUpEmailText
data.value: You cannot sign up as '{0}'. Please enter a real email address, and try again.

data.name: MessageServerUpdateText
data.value: The AxCrypt-server has been updated. Please update AxCrypt soon. Unexpected errors may occur otherwise.

data.name: MessageSigningUpText
data.value: You have now signed up as '{0}'. Please check your inbox for an email with a 6-digit verification code.

data.name: MessageSignUpUnexpectedErrorText
data.value: Something unexpected went wrong. Please try again. If the problem persists, please report this.

data.name: MessageUnsubscribedConfirmation
data.value: You're now unsubscribed from news and information emails.
data.comment: The main message displayed when unsubscribed

data.name: MoreButtonText
data.comment: A 'More...' button text

data.name: MoreKeyFileToolTop
data.value: Click to enter the name of a key file. Only use if you know you used a key file when securing this file with the previous version of AxCrypt.
data.comment: A tooltip for a more button displaying a key file entry field

data.name: MyAxCryptFolderName
data.comment: The folder name used for default watching

data.name: NewSecretSuccess
data.value: Your new password entry has been saved.

data.name: NewVersionIsAvailableTooltip
data.value: Version {0} is available! Click to download.

data.name: NoDefaultEncryptionKeySetToolTip
data.value: You are Signed Out. Click to Sign In.

data.name: NoInternetErrorMessage
data.value: Can't connect to server right now, please check your internet connection.
data.comment: Message which is displayed when device doesn't have internet connection.

data.name: NoNeedToCheckForUpdatesTooltip
data.value: No need to check for updates.

data.name: NoPremiumWarning
data.value: You do not have a Premium subscription, so you are not using the highest level of security. Click to upgrade!

data.name: NotFoundPageBody
data.value: Unfortunately we could not display the page you were looking for. This might be because it does not exist, a server restart caused your browser session to become outdated, or some other error that caused us to be unable to process the request. Requested page: {2} Your request has been logged. Please try again with the correct path, or report a broken link. To return to the start page, click here.

data.name: NotFoundPageTitle
data.value: The page could not be displayed!

data.name: NotFoundSafePageBody
data.value: Unfortunately we could not find the page you were looking for. This might be due to a server restart that caused your browser session to become outdated, or some other server error that caused us to be unable to process the request. Your request has been logged. Please try again with the correct path, or report a broken link. To return to the start page, click here.

data.name: OfflineAccountBePatient
data.value: This may take a few minutes. Please be patient.

data.name: OfflineIndicatorText
data.comment: A short text, or word, used for example in the titlebar to indicate that we're operating in offline mode: [Offline]

data.name: OfflineNoPremiumWarning
data.value: You're offline so we can't check your Premium subscription. Please go online so we can update your status!

data.name: OldVersionTooltip
data.value: Your version is old. Please click to check for a newer version.

data.name: OpenToolStripButtonToolTipText
data.value: Click to select a secured file to open.

data.name: OptionsConvertMenuItemText
data.comment: The menu text for the option to automatically convert legacy 1.x files to AxCrypt 2 format.

data.name: OptionsConvertMenuToolTip
data.value: Enable or disable the automatic upgrade and conversion of older AxCrypt 1.x files as they are used.
data.comment: The tool tip explanation for the option to enable auto conversion of legacy 1.x files

data.name: PasswordManagementListPageBody
data.value: Manage all your passwords online in the cloud with AxCrypt Password Management, your online safety deposit for passwords, codes, pins, etc. Your passwords are stored in a securely encrypted archive and are available to you, and only you, anywhere at any time. [Collapse]... [Read more]

data.name: PasswordManagementPageTitle
data.comment: A one-word title for the password manager, typically having the meaning of 'passwords', i.e. the plural form of Password.

data.name: PasswordPolicyViolation
data.value: The password is not good enough to be acceptable.

data.name: PasswordResetHyperLink
data.comment: The URL to a web page where a password can be reset

data.name: PasswordResetMailBody1
data.value: You have requested to reset your AxCrypt ID password. This will not restore access to encrypted files or passwords, it will only let you sign in again. To complete this process and pick a new password, please click the button below.

data.name: PasswordResetPageBody
data.value: If you have previously registered but have forgotten the password, or for some reason not received or lost the verification link, you may re-register and request a new verification e-mail here. If you have forgotten your password this will allow you to sign in again, but you will not re-gain access to any encrypted files or information stored in the online password manager. It remains encrypted with your old password, and we cannot decrypt it. Enter your e-mail below to a send an verification or password reset link to the specified address.

data.name: PasswordResetShortLink
data.comment: Text of link to Forgot password screen in mobile app

data.name: PasswordResetSuccess
data.value: An attempt to send the AxCrypt ID verification code to {0} has been made. Please check your e-mail inbox. If you appear not to receive it, check that it does not get caught by your anti-spam measures, and that {0} is correct.

data.name: PasswordRulesInfo
data.value:
AxCrypt has a sophisticated password strength evaluator based on measuring the actual strength of the password. It must also be at least 8 effective characters long.
We evaluate the password by estimating the strength, which is based on how long and complex the password is.
The evaluation entirely disregards parts of the password that is recognized as being among the 1,000 most common passwords, as well as white space. For example the password 'secretX password Y 123456' is evaluated as just 'XY', since spaces, 'secret', 'password' and '123456' are ignored!
We classify the password in 4 categories of increasing strength, were we do not accept any password in the lowest category. The above example is not accepted for that reason.
data.comment: A text describing the rules for passwords for AxCrypt. Pure text. For HTML views, newlines must be replaced, and possibly wrap it with a CSS style.

data.name: PasswordRulesShortInfo
data.value:
AxCrypt uses an advanced dynamic password strength calculator.
White space, and parts that are equal to common passwords are ignored and do not add any strength.
data.comment: A shorter description of how password strength is evaluated.

data.name: PasswordStrengthBadName
data.comment: Short displayed name of "Bad" password status

data.name: PasswordStrengthBadTip
data.value: Password is too weak to be safe to use.
data.comment: Status 'Red' We'll accept it, but it's really not a good idea!

data.name: PasswordStrengthStrongName
data.comment: Short displayed name of the "Strong" password status

data.name: PasswordStrengthStrongTip
data.value: Password is strong and good enough to recommend.
data.comment: Status 'Green'. This is a really good password!

data.name: PasswordStrengthUnacceptableName
data.comment: Short displayed name of Unacceptable password status

data.name: PasswordStrengthUnacceptableTip
data.value: Password is too short or too similar to a common password to be acceptable.
data.comment: Shown when no password is typed or it is effectively empty

data.name: PasswordStrengthWeakName
data.comment: Short displayed name of "Weak"password status

data.name: PasswordStrengthWeakTip
data.value: Password is not strong enough to be recommended.
data.comment: Status 'Orange'. It's almost an ok password, but it's not good enough to be really recommended.

data.name: PolishLanguageSelection
data.comment: The Polish name for polish in a language selection menu.

data.name: PortugueseBrazilLanguageSelection
data.comment: The name of the Portuguese Brazil language. Do not translate.

data.name: PremiumAccountLabel
data.comment: Title displayed on account panel in mobile application, when premium subscription is active

data.name: PremiumExpiresSoonMailBody0Html
data.value: Your AxCrypt Premium subscription is coming to an end soon. I sincerely hope you have enjoyed using our features and found them useful.

data.name: PremiumExpiresSoonMailBody1Html
data.value: I’d love for you to continue using our Premium features. Extend your subscription now .
data.comment: {0} is the root URL to the account site. {1} is the URL-encoded e-mail adress.

data.name: PremiumExpiresSoonMailBody2Html
data.value: With your Premium subscription you will continue to enjoy:

data.name: PremiumExpiresSoonMailBody3Html
data.value: Let me know what you think about AxCrypt - Will you continue to use it and is there something that you would like to see improved?

data.name: PremiumExpiresSoonMailSubject
data.value: Your AxCrypt Premium subscription expires soon!

data.name: PremiumFeatureToolTipText
data.value: This feature requires a purchase of Premium!

data.name: PremiumNeededForKeyShare
data.value: Key sharing requires Premium. Click to upgrade now!

data.name: PremiumNeededForMobileApp
data.value: Sorry, but you don't have a Premium subscription. Upgrade your account now to use the Premium features provided by AxCrypt outside of the app, which are also required for the app to function.
data.comment: Message displaying when user works with mobile app without premium subscription.

data.name: PremiumRequiredBuyNowPopup
data.value: This feature requires a paid plan! Would you like us to open a web page where you can make a purchase?
data.comment: A popup with OK and Cancel buttons, telling the user that a paid plan is required, and asking if we should open a browser window where the user can make a purchase.

data.name: PremiumSupportRequestMailSubect

data.value: Press and hold to view more
data.comment: Tooltip for Press and hold gesture in mobile application

data.name: PriceExcludingVat
data.comment: Brief text used to display the price exclusive of VAT, as additional information. The price is typically shown inclusive. This text is only displayed if any VAT is added.

data.name: PricePerMonth
data.comment: Brief text used to display the cost / month for a subscription.

data.name: ProgressIndicatorCleanupMessage
data.comment: Message displayed on progress bar during temporary files cleanup.

data.name: ProgressIndicatorFeedbackMessage

data.name: PromptKeepMeSignedIn

data.name: PromptLabelText

data.name: PurchaseErrorSubscriptionTime
data.value: The selected subsciption time is invalid. A valid subscription has to be at least {0} month and no longer than {1} months.

data.name: PurchasePageBody1
data.value: With Premium you can use AxCrypt to its full potential on any number of computers and devices. If something is not to your satisfaction, please contact us. We'll always refund you in full.

data.name: PurchasePageBody2
data.value: [More about payments]Your personal payment details are never sent to or stored on our servers. We send them directly from you to our payment gateway partners via an encrypted connection. We partner with Stripe and PayPal, both of which meet the high standards set by the Payment Card Industry Data Security Standard. [Collapse]

data.name: PurchaseReceiptErrorPageBody
data.value: We never received your payment. This may result from manually cancelling the purchase on PayPal or due to insufficient account balance.

data.name: PurchaseReceiptSuccess
data.value: Thank you for purchasing AxCrypt Premium! Please sign out and sign in again from any app to update it to Premium.

data.name: PurchaseReceiptSuccessPageBody
data.value:
You're now able to access all the premium features of AxCrypt. You may need to sign out of the app and sign in again. If you experience any problems, please contact our support.
A receipt of your purchase has been sent to your e-mail.

data.name: PurchaseVatDepends
data.value: VAT may be adjusted during payment.
data.comment: A text indicating that the final VAT is determined by the payment provider.

data.name: PurchaseVatEstimated
data.value: VAT is estimated. No support for business VAT deduction yet, sorry.

data.name: PurchaseVatExcluded
data.comment: A sentence saying that VAT is excluded.

data.name: RateApplicationLinkAndroid
data.comment: Link to app store in mobile application (Android)

data.name: RateApplicationLinkIos
data.comment: Link to application store in mobile application (iOS

data.name: RateApplicationLinkSecondPartAndroid
data.comment: Clickable part of "Rate us on Google Play" link in Android mobile application

data.name: RateApplicationLinkSecondPartIos
data.comment: Clickable part of "Rate us on App Store" link in iOS mobile application

data.name: RegisterError
data.value: Registration failed. Please check your e-mail and try again.

data.name: RegisterPageBody
data.value:
To start using AxCrypt you have to sign up for an AxCrypt ID by submitting your e-mail address in the form below. A message containing an verification link will then be sent to the specified address and when you click that link you will be asked to choose a password. That's it!
A 30 day trial of AxCrypt Premium is included and you can start it at any time from the AxCrypt app.

data.name: RegisterPageTitle
data.value: Sign up for an AxCrypt ID

data.name: RegisterSuccess
data.value: You have now signed up for an AxCrypt ID! Check your e-mail {0} for an verification link.

data.name: ReliabilityLabel
data.comment: Title of "Reliability" section of About Us page in mobile application.

data.name: ReliabilitySectionText
data.value: AxCrypt has been on the market for 15 years, and has grown to become one of the world’s most popular encryption softwares with more than 20 million downloads. Over the years we have also been mentioned and rated by many as one of the world’s best softwares for encryption.
data.comment: Description of "Reliability" section of About Us page in mobile application.

data.name: ReliabilityUpdateAvailableWarning
data.value: Your software needs to be updated due to a reliability issue.
data.comment: Displayed prominently, perhaps as a pop-up, when it's discovered that an update is available the contains a reliability fix.

data.name: RemoveRecentFileLabel
data.comment: Text of "Remove File" button in mobile application

data.name: RemoveRecentFileToolStripMenuItemText
data.value: Remove from list but keep file secured

data.name: ReportSnapshotIntro
data.value:
This is a snapshop report of detected errors in AxCrypt. Please copy all of this text and e-mail to:
To: support@axcrypt.net Subject: AxCrypt Report Snapshot
data.comment: Included as the first part of a snapshot report with logged errors etc.

data.name: ResendButtonText
data.comment: A button in a verification dialog that causes the verification to be resent.

data.name: ResendButtonToolTip
data.value: Click to resend the verification code to your e-mail.

data.name: RussianLanguageSelection
data.comment: The name of the Russian Language in Russian. It should never be translated.

data.name: SameFilePasswordAsSignedInError
data.value: You are already signed in with this password! Please provide the original password for this file.
data.comment: If a user is prompted for a password for a file, and types the same as already signed in, this indicates a misunderstanding and should be explained.

data.name: SaveSecretErrorIsReadOnly
data.value: Only premium users are allowed to save password entries.

data.name: SecretsWarningIsReadOnly
data.value: You do not have a Premium subscription and can therefore no longer edit or create new password entries. However, you can still see existing entries. If you have not used your 30 day Premium Trial period, you can start it from the AxCrypt app.

data.name: SecretsWarningIsSoonExpired
data.value: Your premium subscription expires soon, on {0}. Thereafter you'll have to extend your premium subscription to be able to edit or create new password entries. You'll retain read-only access indefinitely.

data.name: SecurityLabel
data.comment: Title of "Security" section of About Us page in mobile application.

data.name: SecuritySectionText
data.value: Security is crucial to us. Everything we do with AxCrypt is done with security as the highest priority. We make sure that no one ever gets access to your encrypted files, as long as you have control of your own password.
data.comment: Description of "Security" section of About Us page in mobile application.

data.name: SecurityUpdateAvailableWarning
data.value: Your software needs to be updated due to a security issue.
data.comment: Displayed prominently, perhaps as a pop-up, when it's discovered that an update is available the contains a security fix.

data.name: SetEmailLabel
data.comment: Title of SetEmail step on SignUp page in mobile application

data.name: SettingsDeletePageBody
data.value: Here you can delete your AxCrypt ID permanently from the system. All data associated with your AxCrypt ID, including saved password entries, will also be deleted. Enter your password below to a delete your AxCrypt ID.

data.name: SettingsEmailPageBody
data.value:
To change the e-mail associated with your AxCrypt ID, type in a new e-mail address below. This will affect how you sign in to the site and where site e-mails are sent.
A confirmation e-mail will be sent to the new address. The change is effective only after the confirmation link is clicked and a successful sign in.

data.name: SettingsNotificationsPageBody
data.value: Choose your preference for AxCrypt notification e-mails below.

data.name: SettingsPasswordPageBody
data.value:
To change password, provide the current password and then specify and verify your new password.
Choose something difficult to guess, since it will protect passwords in the online password manager as well as access to the site. Type slowly and carefully, and do not forget your new password!

data.name: SharedWithUnverifiedMessagePattern
data.value:
You are about to share securely with someone who has received but not yet responded to an invitation to use AxCrypt.
Please consider informing '{0}' directly about AxCrypt file security.

data.name: ShareWithOthersDescription
data.value: One-click access to the AxCrypt password manager
data.comment: Description of "Share With Others" slide on Onboarding screen in mobile application.

data.name: ShareWithOthersTitle
data.comment: Title of "Share With Others" slide on Onboarding screen in mobile application.

data.name: ShowInFolderText
data.comment: The menu text for a context menu for a file to show the folder that the file is in.

data.name: SignInBeforePremiumMessage
data.comment: A short message used in the sign in dialog, to explain that a user should sign in first and then purchase or try premium as appropriate.

data.name: SimplicityLabel
data.comment: Title of "Simplicity" section of About Us page in mobile application.

data.name: SimplicitySectionText
data.value: Encryption is complicated, but this has not prevented us from constantly working to simplify it for the user. We have developed unique features that make the use of strong encryption and the sharing of encryption keys more simple and secure than any other software.
data.comment: Title of "Simplicity" section of About Us page in mobile application.

data.name: SiteRestartWarning
data.value: Warning! A site restart is scheduled in a few minutes. We're sorry about the inconvenience.

data.name: SocialMediaFollowText

data.name: SpanishLanguageToolStripMenuItemText

data.name: TrialPremiumStartInfo

Great! Now you can use all features of AxCrypt for free during the trial period.
Good Luck and Enjoy,
The AxCrypt Team
data.comment: A short message congratulating the user on having started the trial period.

data.name: TroubleRememberingLabel

data.name: TryItDescription
data.value: Secure files on the desktop, and read them on the road
data.comment: Description of "Try It" slide on Onboarding screen in mobile application.

data.name: TryItTitle

data.name: TryPremiumLabel

data.name: TryPremiumToolTip

data.comment: A tooltip explaining that a user can get a free trial of premium by clicking on the link.

data.name: TurkishLanguageToolStripMenuItemText

data.name: UnknownCrypto
data.comment: Displayed when an unknown CryptoId is encountered.

data.name: UnknownLogOn
data.value: Password is not previously known. Click 'New' to create a new.

data.name: UnregisterMailBody1
data.value: This is confirmation that your AxCrypt ID on AxCrypt.net has been successfully deleted.

data.name: UnregisterMailBody2
data.value: We're sad to see you go and hope you enjoyed your time with us!

data.name: UnsubscribeMailFooter
data.value: If you would like to unsubscribe click this link

data.name: UpgradeLegacyFilesMenuToolTip
data.value: Select a place to search for files secured with AxCrypt 1.x and upgrade them.

data.name: UpgradePromptText
data.comment: One-word text for a link-label text asking the user to upgrade to premium.

data.name: UserSettingsFormatChangeNeedsReset
data.value: You have updated AxCrypt. Unfortunately, your configuration must be reset. After restarting, your preferences and settings will unfortunately be lost. We apologize for the inconvenience. Your encrypted files are still safe and ok.

data.name: VerificationEmailSentTitle
data.comment: The title of the page stating that a verification email has been sent.

data.name: VerifyAccountLabel
data.comment: Text displayed on Activation code page in mobile app.

data.name: WarningTitle
data.comment: The title of a pop up or dialog with a warning.

data.name: WelcomeMailBody1Html
data.value: I’m really happy that you have signed up! To make you feel really welcome, I’m giving you the chance to try our Premium functions for 30 days for free. Just start your trial at any time from the AxCrypt app.

data.name: WelcomeMailBody2Html
data.value: With AxCrypt Free or AxCrypt Premium, you can secure your files in a truly easy way. Encrypting your files and entire folders is just a click away. Working with the encrypted files is just as easy too!

data.name: WelcomeMailBody3Html
data.value: As a Premium subscriber there are a number of excellent additional features for you on top of all the regular free functionality. With Premium you're getting features like:

data.name: WelcomeToAxCrypt
data.value:
Welcome to AxCrypt!
Using AxCrypt is really easy. Start with the main window, or use double-click and right-click in Windows Explorer for fully integrated use.
To encrypt your first files, click the + icon in the toolbar and select them.
For more information, click OK to open a web browser to our web site.

data.name: WelcomeToAxCryptForMac
data.value:
Welcome to AxCrypt for Mac!
Using AxCrypt is really easy. Start with the main window, or use double-click in Finder.
To encrypt your first files, click the + icon in the toolbar and select them.
For more information, click OK to open a web browser to our web site.
data.comment: A longer message for a dialog box the first time a Mac user starts AxCrypt.

data.name: WixAxNeedUninstall
data.value: You must uninstall the currently installed AxCrypt on this computer first.

data.name: WixAxOsNotSupported
data.value: This computer's version of Windows is not supported.

data.name: WixCaption
data.comment: [WixBundlePart] should NOT be translated.

data.name: WixConfirmCancelMessage
data.value: Are you sure you want to cancel?

data.name: WixFailureHyperlinkLogText
data.value: One or more issues caused the setup to fail. Please fix the issues and then retry setup. For more information see the <a href="#">log file</a>.

data.name: WixFailureRestartText
data.value: You must restart your computer to complete the rollback of the software.

data.name: WixFilesInUseCloseRadioButton
data.value: Close the applications and attempt to restart them.

data.name: WixFilesInUseDontCloseRadioButton
data.value: Do not close applications. A reboot will be required.

data.name: WixFilesInUseLabel
data.value: The following applications are using files that need to be updated:

data.name: WixHelpText
data.value:
/install | /repair | /uninstall | /layout [directory] - installs, repairs, uninstalls or creates a complete local copy of the bundle in directory. Install is the default.
/passive | /quiet - displays minimal UI with no prompts or displays no UI and no prompts. By default UI and all prompts are displayed.
/norestart - suppress any attempts to restart. By default UI will prompt before restart. /log log.txt - logs to a specific file. By default a log file is created in %TEMP%.
data.comment: The /install, /uninstall and all other /xxxxxx shold NOT BE TRANSLATED

data.name: WixInstallAcceptCheckbox
data.value: I agree to the license terms and conditions

data.name: WixInstallVersion
data.comment: [WixBundleVersion] should NOT BE TRANSLATED

data.name: WixMsiArpComments
data.comment: The title in Control Panel add/remove

data.name: WixMsiDescription
data.comment: Description in MSI

data.name: WixMsiDoNotInstall32BitOn64Bit
data.value: This is a 32 bit MSI installer. You have 64-bit Windows. Get the MSI with 'x64' in the filename instead of 'Win32'.

data.name: WixMsiExitDialogText
data.value: QUICK START: To encrypt a file, right-click the file in Windows Explorer and select AxCrypt | Encrypt.
data.comment: The final message in the MSI installer

data.name: WixMsiExternalName
data.comment: How AxCrypt is written for users

data.name: WixMsiFileTypeName
data.comment: How encrypted files are named in Windows Explorer

data.name: WixMsiLaunchAxCryptDescription
data.comment: Start Menu tooltip to start AxCrypt

data.name: WixMsiLegacyAxCrypt
data.value: You must uninstall the previous version of AxCrypt before proceeding. Be sure to reboot when asked to.
data.comment: Error message when too old AxCrypt is already installed.

data.name: WixMsiMainExecutablesTitle
data.comment: Feature name in installer

data.name: WixMsiNet45Required
data.value: This application requires .NET Framework 4.5 or higher. Please install the .NET Framework then run this installer again.
data.comment: Error message when .NET 4.5 is missing

data.name: WixMsiNoDowngrade
data.value: Newer or same version already installed! Please uninstall that version before proceeding. Be sure to reboot when asked to.
data.comment: Error message during installation when a newer version already is installed.

data.name: WixMsiShellExtensionTitle
data.comment: Feature name for the shell extension during installation

data.name: WixMsiStartAxCrypt
data.comment: Prompt to start AxCrypt after installation

data.name: WixSuccessRestartText
data.value: You must restart your computer before you can use the software.

data.name: WrongFileExtensionWarning
data.value: '{0}' has the wrong file name extension. It must be '{1}'!

data.name: WrongVerificationCode
data.value: Wrong verification code. Please re-check you email.

data.name: WrongVerificationCodeFormat
data.value: The verfication code must be exactly 6 digits.
